key.name: selectclip
key.description: The text that you select will be added automatically to the clipboard if value is true.

key.name: copyselected
key.description: This will tell applet whether to automatically copy selection to clipboard or not.

key.name: searchsensitive
key.description: Whether to use case sensitivity while searching.

key.name: savehistory
key.description: Whether to save history to a file or not.

key.name: pastefromclipboard
key.description: Whether to paste after Clicking any clips from Clipboard or not.

key.name: custompath
key.summary: Custom Path where History of the clipboard is stored.
key.description: It stores the custom path of the history of the clipboard

key.name: historylength
key.description: Maximum number of clips history can hold.

key.name: privatemode
key.description: If true this prevent copying any Clip.

key.name: notifications
key.description: If true this will notify about your activity with clipboard manager.

key.name: selectimage
key.description: The image that you copy will be added automatically to the clipboard if value is true.

key.name: clipheight
key.description: This is the height of the scrollable clipboard window.
